mapper.select: SELECT order1.order_id,order2.order_status,order1.user_pay_amount,order1.create_time FROM tb_room_order AS order1 JOIN tb_order_status AS order2 ON order1.order_id = order2.order_id WHERE order1.user_id = #{userId} AND order1.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY order1.create_time DESC

SELECT order1.order_id,order1.create_time,order1.user_id,order1.user_pay_amount, order2.order_status,user.username,user.phone FROM tb_room_order AS order1 JOIN tb_order_status AS order2 ON order1.order_id = order2.order_id JOIN tb_user AS user ON order1.user_id = user.user_id JOIN tb_room AS room ON order1.room_id = room.room_id WHERE room.hotel_id = #{hotelId} ORDER BY order1.create_time DESC
